Detailed Description

Computes the spiking rate of a neuron.

The rate (in Hz) is computed for all the spikes between times t_start and t_stop. The method template SpikingRateOutputter::operation depends on the the template parameter FileWrapper. Derives from DataRecordNeuronVisitor to be able to retrieve the spike list from neurons.

unsigned SpikingRateOutputter::nb_outputs_for_neuron ( NeuronInterface *  const  )  [inline]

Returns 1, one rate per neuron.

Used by a class NeuronListHandler (see OutputterImpl) to determine the number of outputs to pass to a FileWrapper.

void SpikingRateOutputter::operation ( const Time &  t_start,
const Time &  t_stop,
NeuronInterface *const   nrn,
FileWrapper *const   file_wrapper 
) [inline]

Calls SpikingRateOutputter::compute_rate and send the results to the FileWrapper.

Method template called according to the real type of FileWrapper.

Parameters:
t_start Start time. Anterior spike times are ignored.
t_stop Stop time. Posterior spike times are ignored.
nrn Neuron to treat.
file_wrapper (of type FileWrapper).

Returns the time-averaged rate of the spike train.

Parameters:
t_start Start time. Anterior spike times are ignored.
t_stop Stop time. Posterior spike times are ignored.
